subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Corporate Gifts
subcategorii.desc_en: Discover personalized corporate gifts for bosses, business partners, and colleagues. Choose a unique, custom-engraved desk gift or trophy that shows appreciation and motivates every day—fully tailored to the recipient, with nationwide shipping.

parinte.title_en: Gifts Factory: Personalized & Unique Gifts for Every Occasion
parinte.desc_en: Explore Gifts Factory for personalized, unique gift ideas—ideal for birthdays, weddings, anniversaries, holidays, and corporate gifting.

subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Gifts for Bosses & Leaders
subcategorii.desc_en: Elegant, personalized gifts for bosses and leaders: custom trophies, engraved plaques and moss decor that convey respect, appreciation and professionalism.

parinte.title_en: Gifts Factory: Personalized & Unique Gifts for Every Occasion
parinte.desc_en: Explore Gifts Factory for personalized, unique gift ideas—ideal for birthdays, weddings, anniversaries, holidays, and corporate gifting.

subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Gifts for Surgeons: Thank-You, Promotion & Retirement
subcategorii.desc_en: Meaningful, personalized gifts for surgeons: engraved plaques and trophies with name, specialty, surgery date or heartfelt message. Ideal thank-you, promotion or retirement presents.

subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Gifts for Gynecologists & OB-GYNs
subcategorii.desc_en: Say thank you with personalized gifts for gynecologists: engraved trophies and plaques with name, birth date, or message - meaningful keepsakes for OB-GYNs.

subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Gifts for Dentists
subcategorii.desc_en: Find memorable dentist gifts—engraved trophies, custom plaques and photo frames—for practice openings, exam milestones or a meaningful thank-you. Personalize names, messages, designs, colors and dental symbols for unique office decor that shows appreciation.

subcategorii.title_en: Gifts for Psychologists: Personalized Trophies, Plaques & Decor
subcategorii.desc_en: Discover thoughtful gifts for psychologists: personalized trophies and plaques, stabilized moss decor, and custom designs to celebrate milestones or say thank you.

subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Gifts for Rheumatologists
subcategorii.desc_en: Thoughtful personalized gifts for rheumatologists: custom trophies, engraved plaques and frames with name, specialty and your message—perfect for birthdays, retirements or thank‑you gifts.

subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Gifts for Pediatricians
subcategorii.desc_en: Personalized gifts for pediatricians: custom trophies, engraved plaques, and nature-inspired decor with your message. A meaningful thank-you for great care.

subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Gifts for Cardiologists
subcategorii.desc_en: Discover personalized gifts for cardiologists—custom trophies, elegant plaques, and natural office decor. Ideal for residency graduation, exams, and career milestones.

subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Gifts for Oncologists - Trophies, Plaques & Keepsakes
subcategorii.desc_en: Discover thoughtful, personalized gifts for oncologists: custom trophies, engraved plaques and LED keepsakes with names and messages, perfect for thank-you gifts and milestones.

subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Gifts for Orthopedic Surgeons & Orthopedists
subcategorii.desc_en: Discover personalized gifts for orthopedic surgeons & orthopedists: custom trophies, engraved plaques, and LED lamps—ideal for residency milestones, promotions, or clinic anniversaries.

subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Gifts for Veterinarians | Custom Vet Gifts
subcategorii.desc_en: Personalized gifts for veterinarians: custom trophies, engraved plaques, and keepsakes with names, dates, or pet motifs. Thoughtful, memorable, clinic-ready.

subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Nutritionist Gifts
subcategorii.desc_en: Say thank you with personalized gifts for nutritionists. Custom trophies, elegant plaques, and photo frames with your message become meaningful, desk-ready keepsakes that celebrate your journey together.

subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Gifts for Nurses
subcategorii.desc_en: Discover thoughtful, personalized gifts for nurses that say thank you. Add a name, ward, or heartfelt message to a custom trophy, engraved plaque, or nature-inspired decor for a lasting keepsake.

subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Gifts for Doctors | Unique Doctor Appreciation Gifts
subcategorii.desc_en: Personalized gifts for doctors: engraved desk decor and practical keepsakes. Add your custom thank-you message for a meaningful gift they'll appreciate in any specialty.

subcategorii.title_en: Teacher Gifts: Personalized Thank-You & End-of-Year Ideas
subcategorii.desc_en: Explore thoughtful, personalized gifts for teachers, perfect for end-of-year, Teacher Appreciation, or back-to-school. Add your message for a heartfelt thank-you.

subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Military Gifts: Engraved Trophies, Plaques & Awards
subcategorii.desc_en: Honor service with personalized military gifts: custom trophies, engraved plaques in wood or acrylic, LED and moss designs, ideal for promotions, retirements & Army Day.

subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Legal Gifts for Lawyers, Judges & Magistrates
subcategorii.desc_en: Shop personalized legal gifts for lawyers, judges, and magistrates—custom trophies, engraved plaques, and desk decor for oath ceremonies, promotions, and retirements. Add names, titles, dates, and court or bar logos for a meaningful keepsake.

subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Gifts for Police Officers
subcategorii.desc_en: Say thank you with meaningful, personalized gifts for police officers. From custom trophies with name and rank to elegant plaques, LED badge lamps, and team photo frames, find keepsakes perfect for promotions, retirements, and career milestones that honor pride, loyalty, and camaraderie.

subcategorii.title_en: Custom Firefighter Gifts – Personalized Trophies, Plaques & Frames
subcategorii.desc_en: Discover firefighter gifts that honor courage—personalized trophies, plaques, and frames for promotions, retirements, and milestones. Custom text, rank, date.

subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Gifts for Mayors and Local Officials | Engraved Plaques & Trophies
subcategorii.desc_en: Honor civic leaders with personalized gifts—engraved plaques with city crests, elegant trophies, and custom awards. Add name, title, date, and a meaningful message for official ceremonies, retirements, and recognitions.

subcategorii.title_en: Gifts by Profession – Personalized Trophies and Engraved Plaques
subcategorii.desc_en: Thoughtful gifts by profession—custom trophies, engraved plaques and decor tailored to each career. Perfect for promotions, retirements or a heartfelt thank‑you.

parinte.title_en: Gifts Factory: Personalized & Unique Gifts for Every Occasion
parinte.desc_en: Explore Gifts Factory for personalized, unique gift ideas—ideal for birthdays, weddings, anniversaries, holidays, and corporate gifting.

subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Football Gifts & Trophies
subcategorii.desc_en: Discover personalized football gifts in wood and acrylic: custom trophies, engraved plaques, LED awards, and trophies with preserved moss. Add name, team, date, and message—ideal for players, coaches, and fans on birthdays, team anniversaries, and end-of-season awards.

subcategorii.title_en: Martial Arts Gifts: Karate, Judo, MMA & Aikido Gift Ideas
subcategorii.desc_en: Discover thoughtful martial arts gifts for every level—beginners, kids, and sensei. Shop training gear, personalized accessories, and samurai-inspired decor for karate, judo, MMA, and aikido—perfect for birthdays, belt promotions, holidays, or competitions.

subcategorii.title_en: Gifts for Gamers
subcategorii.desc_en: Shop gaming gifts and gifts for gamers: personalized trophies, wood and acrylic plaques, LED awards, and moss trophies. Customize with names, teams, mottos—ideal for birthdays, tournaments, and team milestones.

subcategorii.title_en: Tennis Gifts: Personalized Trophies, Engraved Awards & Unique Decor
subcategorii.desc_en: Shop tennis gifts for players, coaches, and events: custom trophies with names, dates, and messages; engraved plaques and awards; plus creative tennis-themed moss decor. Perfect for wins, debuts, and season milestones.

subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Sports Gifts: Custom Trophies, LED Lamps & More
subcategorii.desc_en: Personalized sports gifts that tell a story—engraved trophies, custom LED lamps, and more, tailored to their style, passions, and milestones.

subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Gifts for Athletes – Custom Trophies, Engraved Plaques & LED Sports Lamps
subcategorii.desc_en: Celebrate dedication with personalized sports gifts—custom trophies, engraved plaques and LED lamps with names, disciplines and records. Motivating awards that honor milestones and make every victory memorable.

parinte.title_en: Gifts Factory: Personalized & Unique Gifts for Every Occasion
parinte.desc_en: Explore Gifts Factory for personalized, unique gift ideas—ideal for birthdays, weddings, anniversaries, holidays, and corporate gifting.

subcategorii.title_en: Personalized Hobby Gifts: Trophies, Plaques & Awards
subcategorii.desc_en: Celebrate every passion with personalized hobby gifts: custom trophies, plaques, cards, LED and preserved-moss awards in wood and acrylic. Perfect for gamers, anglers, photographers, chefs, and more.
